snippet.name: check
snippet.starttext: <seform:check id="$${id}" label="$${label}" required="$${required:no|yes}" arrange="$${arrange:horizontal|vertical}" rowid="$${rowid}" labelclass="$${labelclass}" labelstyle="$${labelstyle}" fieldclass="$${fieldclass}" fieldstyle="$${fieldstyle}" value="$${value}" checked="$${checked:no|yes}" note="$${note}" />
